JAVA_HOME={{java64_home}} HCAT_PID_DIR={{hcat_pid_dir}}/ HCAT_LOG_DIR={{hcat_log_dir}}/ HCAT_CONF_DIR={{hcat_conf_dir}} HADOOP_HOME=${HADOOP_HOME:-{{hadoop_home}}} #DBROOT is the path where the connector jars are downloaded DBROOT={{hcat_dbroot}} USER={{hcat_user}} METASTORE_PORT={{hive_metastore_port}}
property.description: This is the jinja template for hcat-env.sh file
